name: Soul of Emancipation
originalText: When Soul of Emancipation enters the battlefield, destroy up to three other target nonland permanents. For each of those permanents, its controller creates a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.

rulings.text: If a permanent is no longer a legal target as Soul of Emancipation's triggered ability resolves, that target's controller will not create an Angel for that permanent.

If a permanent is still a legal target as Soul of Emancipation's triggered ability resolves but it isn't destroyed, perhaps because it had a shield counter, its controller will create an Angel token for that permanent.

text: When Soul of Emancipation enters the battlefield, destroy up to three other target nonland permanents. For each of those permanents, its controller creates a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.
